title: NBA 2K15
description:
NBA 2K15 incl. Update 4

Instructions:
1. Mount or extract rld-n2k15.iso
2. Install the game like normal via setup.exe
3. Install updates 1 to 3 in order via their respective installers.
4. For Update 4, copy contents of the UPDATE folder to your NBA 2K15 installation directory
5. Copy the contents of CRACK.English to your NBA 2K15 installation directory unless you want a different language in which case go with the crack for your language.

I also included a seperate cheat table, if you don't know how to work it, check: http://nba-live.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=159&t=97040&sid=cc97d4ac1c8a8d736a5da7e408d8dd1e

I have a decent upload speed but I will only be seeding a couple of hours per day, so forgive me if it takes a while.
